thread.section_title: Truecar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Truecar | truecar.com
thread.title: John Cusumano

author: John Cusumano
title: John Cusumano
text:
With Truecar you don't waist your time arguing with car dealers over price. The dealers call you, they give you their best price. You pick the one you like and that's it. I saved over $950 off the Truecar price and that was an excellent price. You won't be sorry with Truecar. I highly recommend them.
Thanks Truecar for the best car buying experience I've had in a long time.
